Recap: After the prom, an unexpected twist of events happen to many people. Natalie assumes that John has made his decision to be with Marty and done with her when he's late meeting her at Rodi's. She goes to see Brody who concludes he's struck out with Jessica. And Natalie and Brody look like they are going to sleep together. Meanwhile, John goes to find Natalie and Rodi's but Roxy warns him it's too late. Jessica goes to see Ford after he's apparently been rejected for good by Langston as well as Karen and Hannah. She concludes she has the perfect opportunity to "become an adult" and he has the perfect opportunity to sleep with a new person. Markko tells Langston what she has done with Ford is irreparable and he will never forgive her. Yet she tries futilely to apologize. Matthew tells Dani he loves her. But she seems interested in Nate. Destiny is beginning to like Darren. Blair is helping Tea and they are secretly talking while Dani is out yet nobody else knows that Tea is dying.
Transcript: Blair: Go.
Téa: This must be an all-time low for you--spending the night hanging out here babysitting me, as opposed to across the hall with your rather hunky boyfriend.

Natalie: Yeah. I'm leaving Llanview for good.

Natalie: 10 minutes. Awesome. Not gonna make it.

I thought that it would bring him back in time to where I am with our whole future ahead of us and we'd finally get together, but instead he asked Layla to marry him.

Langston: I was confused. I was scared.

Langston: No, of us. We were so young when we first got together. We were each other's first loves.

I would love you for the rest of my life, and I trusted that love. I trusted you!
Langston: I know. I broke that trust, Markko.

Langston: Ford is a very good liar.

I thought if I could just get her to understand that her memories were right there, just under the surface, that I'd get her back.
